item.title: [Req] Ancient Staff Auto Cast?
item.dc:creator: @ddr202 ddr202
item.description:
@ddr202 wrote:

[quote=“Rum0, post:12, topic:11643”]heres my ancient staff auto code
The number 4675 is the staff id number with is ancient staff of course. The animtion is 441 my own blood barrage auto cast number try it, it owns. Must of all clients have this just search for it change it to this.

[code]
} else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4675) { //Auto Ice Barrage
TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY);
iceBarrage();
animation(441, EnemyY, EnemyX);
AnimationReset = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
actionAmount++;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
hitDiff = 29 + misc.random(2);
actionTimer = 2;
setAnimation(1979);
AnimationReset = true;
server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitDiff = hitDiff;
server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].Killing[playerId] += hitDiff;
server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].updateRequired = true;
server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitUpdateRequired = true;
double TotalExp = 0;

				TotalExp = (double)(30000 * hitDiff);
				TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
				addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerMagic);
	
			
				if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) {
					hitDiff = EnemyHP;
				}[/code][/quote]

Hope it works with my client, and if it does, Good job xD

Read full topic

item.title: [Req] Ancient Staff Auto Cast?
item.dc:creator: @Rum0 Rum0
item.description:
@Rum0 wrote:

heres my ancient staff auto code
The number 4675 is the staff id number with is ancient staff of course. The animtion is 441 my own blood barrage auto cast number try it, it owns. Must of all clients have this just search for it change it to this.

[code]
} else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4675) { //Auto Ice Barrage
TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY);
iceBarrage();
animation(441, EnemyY, EnemyX);
AnimationReset = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
actionAmount++;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
hitDiff = 29 + misc.random(2);
actionTimer = 2;
setAnimation(1979);
AnimationReset = true;
server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitDiff = hitDiff;
server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].Killing[playerId] += hitDiff;
server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].updateRequired = true;
server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitUpdateRequired = true;
double TotalExp = 0;

				TotalExp = (double)(30000 * hitDiff);
				TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
				addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerMagic);
	
			
				if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) {
					hitDiff = EnemyHP;
				}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [Req] Ancient Staff Auto Cast?
item.dc:creator: @hi1674 hi1674
item.description:
@hi1674 wrote:

lol go into client.java and serach for for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 135; }

and chnage both 135’s with 99… if the max is 135 if not replace the 135 with what ever it is and serach for that…
